name: Halley's Tale
description:
Made for Metroidvania Month 14 in two weeks because I once again started late.

Note: the prototype ends after beating the second boss and getting the upgrade after it.

A 2D metroidvania following the genre's rules with a robot sword and lasers and all that stuff.

Explore the planet of Akyra in search for your father's technology. Lithium, your robot sword, will travel along with you and will be your most precious ally.

Controls:

Keyboard:

Arrow keys: Move

Z: Jump/Continue dialog

X: Attack/Interact

C: Shoot

Shift: Aim

Esc: Show menu

Controller:

D-Pad: Move

Down button: Jump/Continue dialog

Up button: Attack/Interact

Left button: Shoot

L1: Aim

Start: Show menu
